At the beginning of each upkeep, if you don’t control a Vial, create a Vial token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this and another permanent: Draw a card. Activate only during your turn.”)[/i]
Whenever one or more tokens you control are put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent gets a poison counter and loses 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
